entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Arnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:51 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this morning and this afternoon. Blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:51 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:51 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:51 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
